summary: EVENFLO CHASE COMFORT TOUCH CAR SEAT WITH SNACK TRAY TRAPPED CHILD'S FINGER**CC  THE CONSUMER'S DAUGHTER REACHED DOWN INTO THE SNACK TRAY TO THE RIGHT OF HER CARS SEAT.  SHE MANAGED TO TRAP A FINGER BETWEEN THE TRAY LID AND THE BACK OF THE TRAY AND COULD NOT FREE IT.  THE HARDER SHE PULLED, THE HARDER SHE PULLED, THE HARDER THE LID PINCHED HER FINGER.  THE CONSUMER HAD TO RUN AROUND TO THE BACK SEAT TO FREE HER FINGER.  THE CHILD'S FINGER WAS RED AND SORE BUT NOT BROKEN ( EVENFLO CHASE COMFORT TOUCH CAR SEAT, 3261568L1).  *NM  UPDATED 03/27/07 *JB
